IUnlockFactory","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newImplementation","type":"address"}],"name":"upgradeTo","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newImplementation","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"upgradeToAndCall","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Called by GreenGoodsResolver; grants NFT keys as work badges **Purpose:** - Grants \"work badges\" (Unlock keys) to gardeners when their work is approved - Each garden can have its own badge contract (PublicLock) - Badges serve as verifiable credentials for completed work **Execution Flow:** 1. Resolver calls `onWorkApproved()` after work approval 2. Module checks if garden has a badge contract configured 3. If configured, grants a key to the worker 4. Keys can have custom duration (permanent, time-limited, etc.) **Architecture:** - Upgradeable via UUPS pattern - Isolated from resolver \u2014 failures don't block attestations - Per-garden badge configuration (different locks per garden) - Supports both auto-created and manually configured locks","events":{"AdminChanged(address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when the admin account has changed."},"BeaconUpgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the beacon is changed."},"Initialized(uint8)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"configureLockForGarden(address,address)":{"details":"Lock must already exist; use createLockForGarden to create new","params":{"garden":"The garden address","lock":"The lock address to configure"}},"constructor":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow":"constructor"},"createLockForGarden(address,bytes)":{"details":"Requires factory to be configured","params":{"garden":"The garden address","lockData":"Encoded lock initialization data (see Unlock docs)"},"returns":{"lock":"The created lock address"}},"getLock(address)":{"params":{"garden":"The garden address"},"returns":{"_0":"The lock address (or zero if none)"}},"grantBadgeManually(address,address,bytes32)":{"params":{"garden":"The garden address","workUID":"The work UID for tracking","worker":"The worker to grant badge to"},"returns":{"tokenId":"The badge token ID"}},"hasLock(address)":{"params":{"garden":"The garden address"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the garden has a lock configured"}},"hasValidBadge(address,address)":{"params":{"garden":"The garden address","worker":"The worker address"},"returns":{"_0":"True if worker has a valid (non-expired) badge"}},"initialize(address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"_defaultDuration":"Default badge duration in seconds (0 = permanent)","_owner":"The address that will own the module","_router":"The integration router address","_unlockFactory":"The Unlock factory address (can be zero if not yet deployed)"}},"onWorkApproved(address,address,bytes32)":{"details":"Called by router; silently skips if no lock configured for garden","params":{"garden":"The garden account address","workUID":"The UID of the work attestation","worker":"The worker who submitted the work"},"returns":{"tokenId":"The badge token ID (0 if not granted)"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"removeLockForGarden(address)":{"params":{"garden":"The garden address"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. configureLockForGarden(address,address).details: Lock must already exist; use createLockForGarden to create new

params.lockData: Encoded lock initialization data (see Unlock docs)

returns._0: The lock address (or zero if none)

params.worker: The worker to grant badge to

returns._0: True if the garden has a lock configured
True if worker has a valid (non-expired) badge

params._defaultDuration: Default badge duration in seconds (0 = permanent)
params._owner: The address that will own the module
params._unlockFactory: The Unlock factory address (can be zero if not yet deployed)

onWorkApproved(address,address,bytes32).details: Called by router; silently skips if no lock configured for garden

params.workUID: The UID of the work attestation
params.worker: The worker who submitted the work

returns.tokenId: The badge token ID (0 if not granted)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._duration: The new duration in seconds (0 = permanent)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

configureLockForGarden(address,address).notice: Configures a badge lock for a garden

createLockForGarden(address,bytes).notice: Creates a new lock for a garden using Unlock factory

defaultBadgeDuration().notice: Default badge duration in seconds (0 = permanent)

gardenLocks(address).notice: Mapping of garden address to badge lock address

getLock(address).notice: Gets the badge lock for a garden

hasLock(address).notice: Checks if a garden has a badge lock configured

hasValidBadge(address,address).notice: Checks if a worker has a valid badge from a garden

onWorkApproved(address,address,bytes32).notice: Called when work is approved  grants badge to worker

removeLockForGarden(address).notice: Removes the badge lock configuration for a garden

router().notice: The integration router that can call this module
